content.raw:
A test file:
~~~
<?xml version='1.0'?>
<sdf version='1.5'>
  <world name="default">

    <physics type="dart">
      <dart>
        <solver>
          <solver_type>pgs</solver_type>
        </solver>
      </dart>
    </physics>

    <include>
      <uri>model://ground_plane</uri>
    </include>

    <include>
      <uri>model://sun</uri>
    </include>

    <model name='box0'>
      <pose frame=''>0 0 0.6 0 0 0</pose>
      <link name='link_0'>
        <pose frame=''>0 0.4 0 0.1 0 0</pose>
        <visual name='visual'>
          <geometry>
            <box>
              <size>0.1 0.2 1</size>
            </box>
          </geometry>
        </visual>
        <collision name='collision'>
          <geometry>
            <box>
              <size>0.1 0.2 1</size>
            </box>
          </geometry>
        </collision>
      </link>
      <joint name='join_0' type='revolute'>
        <parent>world</parent>
        <child>link_0</child>
        <pose frame=''>0 0 -0.4 0 0 0</pose>
        <axis>
          <xyz>1 0 0</xyz>
        </axis>
      </joint>
    </model>

    <model name='box1'>
      <pose frame=''>0 0 0.6 0 0 0</pose>
      <link name='link_1'>
        <pose frame=''>0 -0.4 0 -0.1 0 0</pose>
        <visual name='visual'>
          <geometry>
            <box>
              <size>0.1 0.2 1</size>
            </box>
          </geometry>
        </visual>
        <collision name='collision'>
          <geometry>
            <box>
              <size>0.1 0.2 1</size>
            </box>
          </geometry>
        </collision>
      </link>
      <joint name='joint_1' type='revolute'>
        <parent>world</parent>
        <child>link_1</child>
        <pose frame=''>0 0 -0.4 0 0 0</pose>
        <axis>
          <xyz>1 0 0</xyz>
        </axis>
      </joint>
    </model>

  </world>
</sdf>
~~~
content.html:
A test file:

<?xml version='1.0'?>
<sdf version='1.5'>
  <world name="default">

    <physics type="dart">
      <dart>
        <solver>
          <solver_type>pgs</solver_type>
        </solver>
      </dart>
    </physics>

    <include>
      <uri>model://ground_plane</uri>
    </include>

    <include>
      <uri>model://sun</uri>
    </include>

    <model name='box0'>
      <pose frame=''>0 0 0.6 0 0 0</pose>
      <link name='link_0'>
        <pose frame=''>0 0.4 0 0.1 0 0</pose>
        <visual name='visual'>
          <geometry>
            <box>
              <size>0.1 0.2 1</size>
            </box>
          </geometry>
        </visual>
        <collision name='collision'>
          <geometry>
            <box>
              <size>0.1 0.2 1</size>
            </box>
          </geometry>
        </collision>
      </link>
      <joint name='join_0' type='revolute'>
        <parent>world</parent>
        <child>link_0</child>
        <pose frame=''>0 0 -0.4 0 0 0</pose>
        <axis>
          <xyz>1 0 0</xyz>
        </axis>
      </joint>
    </model>

    <model name='box1'>
      <pose frame=''>0 0 0.6 0 0 0</pose>
      <link name='link_1'>
        <pose frame=''>0 -0.4 0 -0.1 0 0</pose>
        <visual name='visual'>
          <geometry>
            <box>
              <size>0.1 0.2 1</size>
            </box>
          </geometry>
        </visual>
        <collision name='collision'>
          <geometry>
            <box>
              <size>0.1 0.2 1</size>
            </box>
          </geometry>
        </collision>
      </link>
      <joint name='joint_1' type='revolute'>
        <parent>world</parent>
        <child>link_1</child>
        <pose frame=''>0 0 -0.4 0 0 0</pose>
        <axis>
          <xyz>1 0 0</xyz>
        </axis>
      </joint>
    </model>

  </world>
</sdf>
